(a) Eligible Core Capital is the total Core Capital less total amount of deductions/adjustments to total Core Capital,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
(b) Eligible Supplementary Capital is the Total Suplementary Capital less total amount of deductions/adjustments to Suplementary Capital after limiting to a maximum of 100 per cent of Tier 1 capital,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
"1 - Provisional, From July 2018 onwards constituents of Regulatory capital is computed based on the Finance Business Act Direction No. 3 of 2018 (Capital Adequacy Requirements) and Finance Leasing Act Direction No. 3 of 2018  (Capital Adequacy Requirements) ",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
